text: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
translation.id.indonesian: Mereka berkata: "Demikianlah Tuhanmu memfirmankan" Sesungguhnya Dialah yang Maha Bijaksana lagi Maha Mengetahui.
